Produced by:

Starring:

Production companies:

Cast: Kevin Daniels as Taylor Pherry and Madude Hims
Production: The film was shot in Savannah, Georgia in 2022.
Release: The film is scheduled to be released in the United States on May 10, 2024. It was previously scheduled to be released in October 2023.
